019package org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager;
020
021import freemarker.core.ParseException;
022import freemarker.template.Configuration;
023import freemarker.template.DefaultObjectWrapperBuilder;
024import freemarker.template.MalformedTemplateNameException;
025import freemarker.template.TemplateException;
026import freemarker.template.TemplateExceptionHandler;
027import freemarker.template.TemplateHashModel;
028import freemarker.template.TemplateNotFoundException;
029import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.ApiException;
030import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.dynamic.DynamicKubernetesApi;
031import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.dynamic.DynamicKubernetesObject;
032import java.io.IOException;
033import java.util.HashMap;
034import java.util.Map;
035import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.Constants.VM_OP_GROUP;
036import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.Constants.VM_OP_VERSION;
037import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.VmDefChanged.Type;
038import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.util.ExtendedObjectWrapper;
039import org.jgrapes.core.Channel;
040import org.jgrapes.core.Component;
041import org.jgrapes.core.annotation.Handler;
042
043/**
044 * Adapts Kubenetes resources to changes in VM definitions (CRs). 
045 */
046@SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis",
047    "PMD.AvoidDuplicateLiterals" })
048public class Reconciler extends Component {
049
050    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.SingularField")
051    private final Configuration fmConfig;
052    private final CmReconciler cmReconciler;
053    private final DataReconciler dataReconciler;
054    private final DisksReconciler disksReconciler;
055    private final PodReconciler podReconciler;
056
057    /**
058     * Instantiates a new reconciler.
059     *
060     * @param componentChannel the component channel
061     */
062    public Reconciler(Channel componentChannel) {
063        super(componentChannel);
064
065        // Configure freemarker library
066        fmConfig = new Configuration(Configuration.VERSION_2_3_32);
067        fmConfig.setDefaultEncoding("utf-8");
068        fmConfig.setObjectWrapper(new ExtendedObjectWrapper(
069            fmConfig.getIncompatibleImprovements()));
070        fmConfig.setTemplateExceptionHandler(
071            TemplateExceptionHandler.RETHROW_HANDLER);
072        fmConfig.setLogTemplateExceptions(false);
073        fmConfig.setClassForTemplateLoading(Reconciler.class, "");
074
075        cmReconciler = new CmReconciler(fmConfig);
076        disksReconciler = new DisksReconciler();
077        dataReconciler = new DataReconciler(fmConfig);
078        podReconciler = new PodReconciler(fmConfig);
079    }
080
081    /**
082     * Handles the change event.
083     *
084     * @param event the event
085     * @param channel the channel
086     * @throws ApiException the api exception
087     * @throws IOException 
088     * @throws ParseException 
089     * @throws MalformedTemplateNameException 
090     * @throws TemplateNotFoundException 
091     * @throws TemplateException 
092     * @throws KubectlException 
093     */
094    @Handler
095    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.ConfusingTernary")
096    public void onVmDefChanged(VmDefChanged event, WatchChannel channel)
097            throws ApiException, TemplateException, IOException {
098        // Get complete VM (CR) definition
099        DynamicKubernetesApi vmCrApi = new DynamicKubernetesApi(VM_OP_GROUP,
100            VM_OP_VERSION, event.crd().getName(), channel.client());
101        var defMeta = event.metadata();
102
103        // Get common data for all reconciles
104        DynamicKubernetesObject vmDef = null;
105        Map<String, Object> model = null;
106        if (event.type() != Type.DELETED) {
107            vmDef = K8s.get(vmCrApi, defMeta).get();
108
109            // Prepare Freemarker model
110            model = new HashMap<>();
111            model.put("cr", vmDef.getRaw());
112            model.put("constants",
113                (TemplateHashModel) new DefaultObjectWrapperBuilder(
114                    Configuration.VERSION_2_3_32)
115                        .build().getStaticModels()
116                        .get(Constants.class.getName()));
117        }
118
119        // Reconcile
120        if (event.type() != Type.DELETED) {
121            dataReconciler.reconcile(model, channel);
122            disksReconciler.reconcile(vmDef, channel);
123            var configMap = cmReconciler.reconcile(event, model, channel);
124            model.put("cm", configMap.getRaw());
125            podReconciler.reconcile(event, model, channel);
126        } else {
127            podReconciler.reconcile(event, model, channel);
128            cmReconciler.reconcile(event, model, channel);
129            disksReconciler.deleteDisks(event, channel);
130        }
131    }
132
133}
